verbs.description: [ARG1: pets residents in oklahoma town] [V: attacked] [ARG0: by pack of dogs] an oklahoma community is on edge following a series of attacks by a pack of dogs johnna brown tells fox 23 she went out on her property recently and saw that her donkey floppy joe had become a target for the dogs oklahoma
